iati-activity.title: Cholera Outbreak in Sierra Leone - Rapid Response Facility
iati-activity.description: To activate the Rapid Response Facility, making £2m available to pre-qualified partners in Sierra Leone to allow them to rapidly scale up their response to the cholera outbreak. Sierra Leone is experiencing its worst outbreak of cholera in more than two decades, with 12,000 cases reported already, and more than 250 deaths.
